lead_paragraph: England coach Eddie Jones says he wants fiery captain Dylan Hartley to play like Tarzan when the Six Nations tournament kicks off against Scotland at Murrayfield on Saturday.

headline.main: Jones Wants England Captain Hartley to 'Play Like Tarzan'
headline.print_headline: Jones Wants England Captain Hartley to 'Play Like Tarzan'

snippet: England coach Eddie Jones says he wants fiery captain Dylan Hartley to play like Tarzan when the Six Nations tournament kicks off against Scotland at Murrayfield on Saturday.
